page.title: 01Quantock Common
page.content: This part of the {Quantocks }is in an {Area of Outstanding Natural {Beauty.}It rises from the fertile farming land along the {A358_Taunton {to Williton road,}seaward to the { {A39_Williton to Holford road. } Besides being very beautiful it is a place of many contrasts and has over the year to cope with many different users. {Quantock Common} the main area of {Common Land}on the Quantocks is used by local residents for {farming, {but in the}summer this area also attracts{tourists }in great numbers.{ {Ramblers,bird_watchers,artists,the {army on exercise,the Hunt and its {followers,sponsered rides and {outward_bound courses, }and many more activities all exert pressures on this very special place.
